original_text: And because the haven was not commodious to winter in, the more part advised to depart thence also, if by any means they might attain to Phenice, and there to winter; which is an haven of Crete, and lieth toward the south west and north west.
korean_text: 그 항구가 겨울을 지내기에 불편하므로 거기서 떠나 아무쪼록 뵈닉스에 가서 겨울을 지내자 하는 자가 더 많으니 뵈닉스는 그레데 항구라 한쪽은 서남을, 한쪽은 서북을 향하였더라

sentences.original_text: And because the haven was not commodious to winter in
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 항구가 겨울을 나기에 적합하지 않았기 때문에

sentences.original_text: the more part advised to depart thence also
if by any means they might attain to Phenice
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 어떻게든 그들이 피니케에 도달할 수 있다면

sentences.original_text: which is an haven of Crete
and lieth toward south west and north west
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 남서쪽과 북서쪽을 향해 위치해 있습니다
